: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus turns off the shower and gets out after they were both clean. He goes back to the bedroom and puts the baby down next to Nightlight.
Rodimus then lays down himself. The past day had worn him out. Roddy puts his arms around Nightlight.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Baby:

Baby gets scared by the Ionic shower's sound and whined while she 
curled to her dad. What was that sound??? she only wanted to be in 
her mommy's arms... mommy would protect her...
